drugs: IV/IO/IM: 1-2 mg/kg initial bolus diluted to 50 mg/mL, over 3-5 minutes
Followed by intermittent doses diluted to 1 mg/mL, over 20-30 minutes

drugs.name: Hydralazine
usage: PIV/IM 0.1-0.2 mg/kg over 1-2 minutes q4hrs prn (max 20 mg)

drugs.name: Labetalol
usage: IV bolus: 0.2-1 mg/kg (max 40 mg) slow push over 2-3 minutes)
Continuous IV infusion: 0.25-3 mg/kg/hr titrated to desired effect
Do not use in asthma patient

drugs.name: Nicardipine
usage: Continuous IV infusion: 0.5-3 mcg/kg/min titrated to desired effect
Do not use with increased ICP

drugs.name: Sodium Nitroprusside[Nipride]
usage: Continuous IV/IO infusion intiate at 0.3-0.5 mcg/kg/min and titrate (max 8-10 mcg/kg/min)
NOTE: if desired effects not achieved after 10 minutes at 10 mcg/kg/min then discontinue!
